Reviews.Title: Very Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: AL-Musafer
Reviews.Content: The Samsung NX1000 is a Very nice and small camera with APS-C sensorSize and weight is compactThe Kit lens 20-50mm is sharp and smallThe 16mm lens is very sharp and compactOverall performance is very good even in low lightThe image quality:The color and light metering is very niceThe image resolution is very highThe ISO up to 1600 is goodThe white balance is very good and accurateOverall it is very good in most situationsThe pixel density:  not so goodThis camera has 20 mega pixels APS-C Sensor,Very high resolution but with higher pixel density means less quality compared to other camera like Sony NEX 6 or Fuji x-pro1 with 16 mega pixels ,The Samsung nx1000 camera could be one of the pests if the mega pixel reduced to 16MP.
